Description: Fragment of the neck of a black-figure painted pottery situla. Dog leaping on bull which looks back.
Curator's comments: The dog has some affinity to Fikellura and related dogs. It wears a collar (for some other examples see Pl. GB 603, 1 (BM GR 1888,0208.26) and BSA xxxiv, 62 n. 10).
Bibliographic references: CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (Pl. GB 604, 1 (and Pl. GB 597, 12)) (Group C.6)
Petrie 1888 / Tanis. Part II. Nebesheh (Am) and Defenneh (Tahpanhes) (pl. xxvi, 13)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 246)
